Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities

Class IslandContainer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities.IslandContainer
public class IslandContainer extends Object
This class is a simple interface to manage a GUI island. Provides all the required methods to create and update it.
